Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM Siebel EIM Oracle COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.2 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 10.1.3.5.0 and above
Description : - Reverse Knowledge Module - Reverse-engineering knowledge module for Siebel EIM (Enterprise Integration Manager) tables. - Projects could be reversed as sub-models (set the Option "Use project" to yes). - EIM tables are reversed as datastores with their columns and their constraints (Primary Keys).
Restrictions : - This KM works only for Siebel on Oracle.

Mask used to filter the projects to be reverse-engineered. '%' returns all the projects.
Sample projects' names: EIM Accounts and Quotes EIM Activity EIM Administrative EIM Agreement EIM Asset Management EIM CTI EIM Call Script EIM Contact EIM Employee and Position EIM Field Service Inventory EIM Field Service Repair EIM Forecasts EIM Incentive Compensation EIM Interface Table 20C EIM Invoice EIM Marketing Campaign EIM Marketing Development Funds EIM Marketing Encyclopedia EIM Misc EIM Opportunity EIM Order Life Cycle EIM Personal Financial Review EIM Pricing EIM Products and Product Lines EIM Professional Services EIM Reference Data EIM Service Request EIM Siebel Interactive EIM Siebel Server EIM Territory EIM Workflow Manager EIM eTraining

select distinct p.ROW_ID SMOD_CODE, p.NAME SMOD_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_PROJECT")%> p inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> r on r.ROW_ID = p.REPOSITORY_ID and r.NAME = '<%=snpRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' where p.NAME like 'EIM%' and p.name like '<%=odiRef.getOption("PROJECT_NAME")%>%'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS)

select tab.table_name TABLE_NAME, 'PK' CONS_TYPE, idx.name KEY_NAME, idx_c.col_postn POS, idx_c.name COL_NAME
from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_INDEX_COLUMN")%> idx_c inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_INDEX")%> idx on (idx.row_id =idx_c.index_id and idx.isunique='Y') inner join (select t.row_id tbl_id, t.NAME TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> t inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_PROJECT")%> p on t.PROJECT_ID = p.ROW_ID and p.NAME like '<%=snpRef.getOption("PROJECT_NAME")%>' and p.NAME like 'EIM%' inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> r on r.ROW_ID = t.REPOSITORY_ID and r.NAME = '<%=snpRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' where t.TYPE= 'Interface' and t.name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>') tab on idx.TBL_ID = tab.TBL_ID
insert into SNP_REV_KEY (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

select tab.table_name TABLE_NAME, 'PK' CONS_TYPE, idx.name KEY_NAME
from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_INDEX")%> idx inner join (select t.row_id tbl_id, t.NAME TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> t inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_PROJECT")%> p on t.PROJECT_ID = p.ROW_ID and p.NAME like '<%=snpRef.getOption("PROJECT_NAME")%>' and p.NAME like 'EIM%' inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> r on r.ROW_ID = t.REPOSITORY_ID and r.NAME = '<%=snpRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' where t.TYPE= 'Interface' and t.name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>') tab on tab.TBL_ID = idx.TBL_ID where idx.isunique='Y'

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC,COL_HEADING, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :COL_HEADING, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '0', '1')

select tab.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, C.NAME COL_NAME, substr(C.DESC_TEXT,1,35) COL_HEADING, substr(C.DESC_TEXT,1,250) COL_DESC, bdd.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, case when bdd.DATA_TYPE ='NUMBER' then bdd.DATA_PRECISION else nvl(bdd.DATA_PRECISION,bdd.DATA_LENGTH) end LONGC, bdd.DATA_SCALE SCALEC, 1 COL_MANDATORY, bdd.COLUMN_ID POS from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_COLUMN")%> C
inner join (select t.row_id tbl_id, t.NAME TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> t inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_PROJECT")%> p on t.PROJECT_ID = p.ROW_ID and p.NAME like '<%=snpRef.getOption("PROJECT_NAME")%>' and p.NAME like 'EIM%' inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> r on r.ROW_ID = t.REPOSITORY_ID and r.NAME = '<%=snpRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' where t.TYPE= 'Interface' and t.name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>') tab on tab.TBL_ID = C.TBL_ID inner join all_tab_columns bdd on C.NAME=bdd.column_name and tab.TABLE_NAME=bdd.table_name and bdd.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' where C.TYPE not like 'IFMGR%'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW,SMOD_CODE) values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'T', :TABLE_DESC, '1',:SMOD_CODE)

select distinct t.NAME TABLE_NAME, t.NAME RES_NAME, substr(t.NAME,1,10) TABLE_ALIAS, substr(t.desc_text,1,250) TABLE_DESC, 0 R_COUNT, <% if ("1".equals(odiRef.getOption("USE_PROJECT"))) { %> t.PROJECT_ID <% } else { %> '' <% } %> SMOD_CODE from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> t inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_PROJECT")%> p on t.PROJECT_ID = p.ROW_ID and p.NAME like '<%=snpRef.getOption("PROJECT_NAME")%>' and p.NAME like 'EIM%' inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> r on r.ROW_ID = t.REPOSITORY_ID and r.NAME = '<%=snpRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' where t.TYPE= 'Interface' and t.name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
